description: A BuildingFurniture is an equipment for occupant use, usually not fixed to the building.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the BuildingFurniture.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the BuildingFurniture.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the BuildingFurniture.

properties.name: lod4Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the BuildingFurniture in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the BuildingFurniture in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
